org.archive.net.rsync

类 Handler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.net.URLStreamHandler
      • org.archive.net.rsync.Handler

  • public class Handler
extends java.net.URLStreamHandler
    A protocol handler that uses native rsync client to do copy. You need to define the system property -Djava.protocol.handler.pkgs=org.archive.net to add this handler to the java.net.URL set. Assumes rsync is in path. Define system property -Dorg.archive.net.rsync.RsyncUrlConnection.path=PATH_TO_RSYNC to pass path to rsync. Downloads to java.io.tmpdir.
